text: The Thomas Crown Affair is a 1968 American romantic crime drama movie directed by Norman Jewison and starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Jack Weston, Paul Burke, Biff McGuire, Addison Powell, Yaphet Kitto, Sidney Armus. It was distributed by United Artists and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards (Oscars) and won an Oscar in 1969. A remake was made in 1999 with the same title starring Pierce Brosnan and Rene Russo. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 romantic drama movies Category:1968 crime movies Category:1968 drama movies Category:1960s crime drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1960s American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Jewison
title: The Thomas Crown Affair (1968 movie)
